name: Light Shoot Bubble - Jungle Fanciful
description:
Light Shoot Bubble - Jungle Fanciful - Fun and addictive bubble shoot game!
Clear all the bubbles on the screen to level up,and try to get 3 stars on each level.
Game Features:
- Ancient style graphics and designs
- Thousands of awesome level to explore
- Addictive gameplay
- Hours of entertainment
- Fun boosters and surprises
